flame.title: Flame
flame.description: Fully charged weapons will set the target on fire for **8** seconds with the next attack, causing ongoing damage of **{{VALUE}}** of ATK every second. Ignited targets receive **50%** efficacy from healing.

flame-physical.title: Flame
flame-physical.description:
Fully charged weapons will set the target on fire for **8** seconds with the next attack, causing ongoing damage of **{{VALUE}}** of ATK every second. Ignited targets receive **50%** efficacy from healing.

{{WEAPONNAME}} is a flame weapon and will always deal flame damage, but it can also take the place of a physical weapon to activate Physical Resonance.

ice.title: Ice Shell
ice.description: Fully charged weapons will **freeze** the target for **2** seconds and leave it frostbitten for **6** seconds. Breaking the ice shell causes additional damage equal to **{{VALUE}}** of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by **50%**.

ice-volt.title: Ice Shell
ice-volt.description:
Fully charged weapons will **freeze** the target for **2** seconds and leave it frostbitten for **6** seconds. Breaking the ice shell causes additional damage equal to **{{VALUE}}** of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by **50%**.

{{WEAPONNAME}} is a frost weapon and will always deal frost damage, but it can also take the place of a volt weapon to activate Volt Resonance.

volt.title: Volt
volt.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will **paralyze** targets for **1** second and electrify them for **6** seconds, negating all buffs and dealing damage equal to **{{VALUE}}** of ATK. Targets can't receive any buffs for the next **6** seconds.

volt-ice.title: Volt
volt-ice.description:
When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will **paralyze** targets for **1** second and electrify them for **6** seconds, negating all buffs and dealing damage equal to **{{VALUE}}** of ATK. Targets can't receive any buffs for the next **6** seconds.

{{WEAPONNAME}} is a volt weapon and will always deal volt damage, but it can also take the place of an frost weapon to activate Ice Resonance.

physical.title: Grievous
physical.description: Fully charged weapons will inflict damage equal to **{{VALUE}}** of ATK with the next attack, and make the target grievous for **7** seconds, taking **20%** extra damage.

physical-flame-global.title: Grievous
physical-flame-global.description:
Fully charged weapons will inflict damage equal to **{{VALUE}}** of ATK with the next attack, and make the target grievous for **7** seconds, taking **20%** extra damage.

{{WEAPONNAME}} is a physical weapon and will always deal physical damage, but it can also take the place of a flame weapon to activate Flame Resonance.

physical-flame.title: Armor Melt
physical-flame.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will apply an armor melt effect to enemies for **45** seconds, increasing the physical and flame damage they take by **10%**, and in team play this value is additionally increased by **15%** (armor melt ***replaces the grievous*** effect on the target and does not allow grievous to get applied again for the duration of armor melt). Every **15** seconds, a target affected by armor melt will be stunned for **2** seconds when taking physical damage and slowed by **50%** for **5** seconds when taking flame damage.

altered.title: Altered
altered.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will mark the target, causing an explosion after **5** seconds. Additionally inflict **25%** of all damage received by the target while the mark exists, up to a total of **{{VALUE}}** of your ATK. Only 1 mark can be added on a target at a time.
